mapper.select: SELECT pw.key, pw.warehouse_no, pwdn.seq, pwdn.warehouse_date, pwdn.dn_no, pwd.partial_id, pwd.quantity, pwd.collation_quantity, pwd.fact_pf_key, v_partial.code, v_partial.name AS partial_name, pbs.spec_kind, pbs.on_shelf FROM partial_warehouse pw JOIN partial_warehouse_dn pwdn ON pw.key = pwdn.key JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON pwdn.key = pwd.key AND pwdn.seq = pwd.seq JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.key = #{key} ORDER BY pwdn.seq,pwd.quantity = pwd.collation_quantity

SELECT v_partial.spec_kind, CASE WHEN pbs.box_count = -1 THEN 1 ELSE CEIL(sum(pwd.quantity) / pbs.box_count) END AS quantity FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.key = #{key} GROUP BY pbs.spec_kind

SELECT pwd.key, pwd.partial_id, pwd.fact_pf_key, pwd.collation_quantity AS quantity , v_partial.code, v_partial.name AS partial_name, pu.split_quantity, CEIL(pwd.collation_quantity / pu.split_quantity) AS total_split_quantity, v_partial.spec_kind FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN partial_unpack pu ON pwd.partial_id = pu.partial_id JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id WHERE pwd.key = #{key} HAVING total_split_quantity > 1 ORDER BY pwd.seq

SELECT v_partial.spec_kind, SUM(pwd.collation_quantity * pu.split_quantity) AS total_split_quantity FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN partial_unpack pu ON pwd.partial_id = pu.partial_id JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id WHERE pwd.key = #{key} GROUP BY v_partial.spec_kind
